name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Shorts - No more unwanted Shorts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Shorts from your YouTube desktop experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you the possibility to hide all unwanted YouTube Shorts by simply flipping a switch on the top of the page.
